mapper.update: update t_sys_user set user_pwd = #{userNewPassword}, gmt_modified = now(), last_modified_by = #{userCode}, version = version + 1 where user_code = #{userCode} and version = #{version}
mapper.select: select a.user_pwd from t_sys_user a where a.user_code = #{userCode} and a.is_deleted = 0

select a.user_image userImage, a.user_name userName, b.store_id storeId, b.store_name storeName, b.invite_code inviteCode, a.role role, a.phone phone, b.address address, a.user_name driverName, a.version version from t_sys_user a left join t_info_store b on a.user_code = b.user_id where a.user_code = #{userCode} and a.is_deleted = 0
